articles.author: John Carney
articles.title: Kyle Bass Calls Editor of China’s Global Times ‘A Disgrace to Humanity’
articles.description: The hedge fund manager is the most prominent American so far to speak up against China's claims that U.S. aid on virus was lacking. | Economy
articles.content:
Hedge fund manager Kyle Bass counterpunched after the editor of China’s communist party mouthpiece Global Times suggested that U.S. aid in fighting the coronavirus outbreak as “belated.”
Bass has become in recent years one of the U.S.’s most stalwart private… [+2403 chars]

articles.author: Kurt Zindulka
articles.title: Scientist Who Discovered Ebola: Britain Faces ‘Major’ Coronavirus Outbreak
articles.description: The United Kingdom is facing a "major outbreak" of the deadly coronavirus, warns the scientist who co-discovered the Ebola virus in Africa.
articles.content:
The United Kingdom is facing a “major outbreak” of the deadly coronavirus, warns the scientist who co-discovered the Ebola virus in Africa.
As the death toll for the coronavirus officially surpasses that of the SARS outbreak in 2003, the director of the Lond… [+2597 chars]
